
.. _program_listing_file_include_types_gamma_table_t.h:

Program Listing for File gamma_table_t.h
========================================

|exhale_lsh| :ref:`Return to documentation for file <file_include_types_gamma_table_t.h>` (``include/types/gamma_table_t.h``)

.. |exhale_lsh| unicode:: U+021B0 .. UPWARDS ARROW WITH TIP LEFTWARDS

.. code-block:: cpp

   #pragma once
   
   #include <cmath>
   #include <vector>
   
   #include <boost/math/special_functions/gamma.hpp>
   #include "codi.hpp"
   
   #include "include/microphysics/constants.h"
   
   struct gamma_table_t {
       uint64_t n_bins;    
       uint64_t n_bins_highres;
       double a; 
       std::vector<double> x; 
       std::vector<double> x_highres; 
       double dx; 
       double dx_highres; 
       double odx; 
       double odx_highres; 
       std::vector<double> igf; 
       std::vector<double> igf_highres;
   
       gamma_table_t();
   
       template <class A = codi::RealReverse>
       A look_lo(A x) const;
   
       template <class A = codi::RealReverse>
       A look_up(A x) const;
   
       void init_gamma_table(
           const uint64_t &nl,
           const uint64_t &nl_highres,
           const double &a);
   };
